Module Reference¶

Main entry point for the PyQtQuick project.

This module initializes the QGuiApplication, sets up the main threads, and loads the QML UI.

Thread-safe queue implementation using QMutex.

Classes¶

Bico_QMutexQueue

A thread-safe queue for inter-thread communication.

class Template_Material.bico_qmutexqueue.Bico_QMutexQueue(items=[])¶

Thread-safe queue using QMutex for synchronization.

Parameters:

items (list, optional) – Initial items for the queue.

dequeue()¶

Remove and return an item from the front of the queue.

Returns:

(item, successful) where successful is 1 if an item was dequeued, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

tuple

dequeueFromFront()¶

Remove and return an item from the back of the queue.

Returns:

(item, successful) where successful is 1 if an item was dequeued, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

tuple

enqueue(item)¶

Add an item to the end of the queue.

Parameters:

item (object) – The item to add.

enqueueToBack(item)¶

Add an item to the front of the queue.

Parameters:

item (object) – The item to add.

Thread class integrating QThread and QML UI.

Classes¶

Bico_QUIThread

Thread class for running tasks with QML UI integration.

class Template_Material.bico_quithread.Bico_QUIThread(qin=None, qin_owner=0, qout=None, qout_owner=0, obj_name='', ui_path='', parent=None)¶

Thread class with QML UI integration and message queue support.

thread_hash¶

Stores all running threads.

Type:

dict

main_app¶

Reference to the main application.

Type:

QGuiApplication

toUI¶

Signal to send data to UI.

Type:

Signal

MainTask()¶

Virtual method to be implemented in subclasses.

Returns:

0 to stop the thread, 1 to continue.

Return type:

int

create(qin=None, qin_owner=0, qout=None, qout_owner=0, obj_name='', ui_path='', parent=None)¶

Create a new thread if not already existing.

Return type:

Bico_QUIThread or None

fromUI(mess, data)¶

Receive data from the UI.

Parameters:

  • mess (str)

  • data (object)

getMainApp()¶

Get the main application instance.

Return type:

QGuiApplication

getThreadHash()¶

Get the dictionary of running threads.

Return type:

dict

remove()¶

Request removal of a thread by name.

Returns:

1 if removed, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int

run()¶

Main thread loop.

selfRemove()¶

Remove a thread from the thread hash.

Parameters:

obj_name (str)

setMainApp()¶

Set the main application instance.

Parameters:

app (QGuiApplication)

start(priority=Priority.InheritPriority)¶

Start the thread and load the QML UI if specified.

Parameters:

priority (QThread.Priority) – Thread priority.

Base thread class for message queue communication.

Classes¶

Bico_QThread

Base class for threads with input/output message queues.

class Template_Material.bico_qthread.Bico_QThread(qin: Bico_QMutexQueue = None, qin_owner: bool = False, qout: Bico_QMutexQueue = None, qout_owner: bool = False)¶

Base thread class with input/output message queues.

Parameters:

  • qin (Bico_QMutexQueue, optional) – Input queue.

  • qin_owner (bool, optional) – Ownership flag for input queue.

  • qout (Bico_QMutexQueue, optional) – Output queue.

  • qout_owner (bool, optional) – Ownership flag for output queue.

qin() → Bico_QMutexQueue¶

Get the input queue.

Return type:

Bico_QMutexQueue

qinDequeue()¶

Dequeue an item from the input queue.

Returns:

(item, successful)

Return type:

tuple

qinDequeueFromFront()¶

Dequeue an item from the front of the input queue.

Returns:

(item, successful)

Return type:

tuple

qinEnqueue(item)¶

Enqueue an item to the input queue.

Returns:

1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int

qinEnqueueToBack(item)¶

Enqueue an item to the back of the input queue.

Returns:

1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int

qout() → Bico_QMutexQueue¶

Get the output queue.

Return type:

Bico_QMutexQueue

qoutEnqueue(item)¶

Enqueue an item to the output queue.

Returns:

1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int

qoutEnqueueToBack(item)¶

Enqueue an item to the back of the output queue.

Returns:

1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int

setQin(qout: Bico_QMutexQueue)¶

Set the output queue.

Parameters:

qout (Bico_QMutexQueue)

Message data object for inter-thread communication.

Classes¶

Bico_QMessData

Data structure for passing messages and data between threads.

class Template_Material.bico_qmessdata.Bico_QMessData(*args)¶

Data structure for passing messages and data between threads.

Parameters:

*args (tuple) – Can be (mess, data) or (src, dst, mess, data).

data()¶

Get the data.

Return type:

object

dst()¶

Get the destination.

Return type:

str

mess()¶

Get the message.

Return type:

str

Parameters:

setDst(dst)¶

Set the destination.

Parameters:

dst (str)

setMess(mess)¶

Set the message.

Parameters:

mess (str)

setSrc(src)¶

Set the source.

Parameters:

src (str)

Get the source.

Return type:

str

Sample implementation of a QUIThread for demonstration.

Returns:
